sources.title: Leaves Of The Tree | Full Movie | Mystery Drama | Sean Young
sources.description:
LEAVES OF THE TREE is a beautifully crafted,  thought-provoking film that pushes the line between humanity and divinity.Â  Filmed on location in Sicily, at the Ancient Doric Temple of Segesta, the Castle of Erice, the Harbor, Castle and Churches of Castellammare del Golfo, Sicily, and the Tonnara of Scopello.Â  In LEAVES OF THE TREE, the past, present and future intersect through the ongoing struggles of doubt, belief and faith; especially for all that come in contact with the leaves of an Olive Tree with mysterious healing powers, that may or not be linked directly to Jesus Christ.
2015.  Stars: Eric Roberts, Sean Young, Armand Assante, Federico Castelluccio

metadata.Plot: Patrick Messina, a once powerful patent lawyer marginalized by a life threatening disease is pushed out of his firm. At a meeting with his last client he encounters a doctor from a rural Sicilian village who has discovered a medicinal "cure all" made from the leaves of a centuries old Olive tree. Patrick's journey to identify the source of the tree's healing power uncovers a secret from ancient scripture that brings the past, present and future struggle with belief and faith for all that come into contact with what may be a modern miracle.
metadata.Actors: Eric Roberts, Sean Young, Armand Assante
